mapper.select: SELECT A.CUL_LIFE_NUM, CUL_LIFE, ADDRESS, PHONE, LOCX, LOCY, REG_DT FROM CULTURAL_LIFE A INNER JOIN CULTURAL_LIFE_BOOKMARK B ON A.CUL_LIFE_NUM = B.CUL_LIFE_NUM WHERE B.MEM_NUM= #{mem_num} ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CULTURAL_LIFE_BOOKMARK WHERE CUL_LIFE_NUM = #{cultureNum} AND MEM_NUM = #{memNum}
